body:
Comment 1: 
I agree this is odd behavior and I've been confused by it myself. You can get past slide
3 by touching the right side of the slide, near the margin. To go back, touch the left
side.

Regardless, the behavior is not obvious and should be either fixed or documented or both.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
